snippet.title: Pivot Pilot (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Pivot Pilot is a challenging platformer with puzzle elements in which you take simultaneous control of a boy and a giant robot arm.

Buy Pivot Pilot on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/569360/

https://twitter.com/sleakku
